contentrichtext.text: {{Multiple issues | primarysources=February 2011 | prose=February 2011}} [[File:Allergydayquil.jpg|right|thumb|DayQuil Sinus Relief]] '''DayQuil''' is a medicine intended to relieve symptoms of the [[common cold]] and flu. Made by [[Vicks]], it is available in syrup and capsule (LiquiCap) form. DayQuil's night time counterpart is [[NyQuil]], which contains sedative [[antihistamines]]. Because DayQuil lacks antihistamines, it does not cause drowsiness, and thus is suitable for use in the daytime. DayQuil was introduced in 1974 under the name "'''DayCare'''". The brand was reintroduced as "DayQuil" in 1992. As with NyQuil, DayQuil no longer contains [[pseudoephedrine]] in the United States. It has been replaced with [[phenylephrine]] due to restrictions on pseudoephedrine sales. In other countries, such as Canada, DayQuil still contains pseudoephedrine.<ref>[http://www.vicks.ca/en/dayquil-cold-flu.php Vicks DayQuil Cold/Flu Relief]</ref> ==Uses== DayQuil is intended for the temporary relief of [[common cold|cold]] and [[flu]] symptoms, including: * [[nasal congestion]] * [[pharyngitis|sore throat]] * [[headache]] * cough due to minor throat and bronchial irritation * muscle pains * [[fever]] ==Ingredients== The active ingredients of DayQuil Cold & Flu Relief (per LiquiCap, or per 15 mL syrup): *[[Acetaminophen]] (325 mg) (pain reliever/fever reducer) *[[Dextromethorphan]] (10 mg) (cough suppressant) *[[Phenylephrine]] (5 mg) (nasal decongestant) It should not be taken by people who consume an excessive amount of [[alcohol]], who are taking other medicines containing [[acetaminophen]], or who are using a prescribed [[monoamine oxidase inhibitor]]. Large amounts of [[caffeine]] should also be avoided if taking this medicine. Other formulations:<ref>[http://www.vicks.com/dayquil Vicks DayQuil]</ref> DayQuil Sinus (per LiquiCap): *[[Acetaminophen]] (325 mg) (pain reliever/fever reducer) *[[Phenylephrine]] (5 mg) (nasal decongestant) DayQuil Cough (per 15 mL syrup): *[[Dextromethorphan]] (15 mg) (cough suppressant) *[[Phenylephrine]] (5 mg) (nasal decongestant) DayQuil Mucus Control (per 15 mL syrup): *[[Guaifenesin]] (200 mg) (expectorant) DayQuil Mucus Control DM (per 15 mL syrup): *[[Dextromethorphan]] (10 mg) (cough suppressant) *[[Guaifenesin]] (200 mg) (expectorant) ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.vicks.com Vicks.com] {{Procter & Gamble}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Dayquil}} [[Category:Vicks brands]] [[Category:1974 introductions]]
